    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Superior Sight](/Feats.aspx?ID=1170) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Age of Ashes</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #150: Broken Promises](/Sources.aspx?ID=15) pg. 77</row>

</column>

---

Your senses are peerless. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks, and you gain [low-light vision](/Rules.aspx?ID=416). If you already have low-light vision, gain [darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=415) instead. Furthermore, when you target an enemy, you automatically succeed at the flat check if that enemy is concealed, hidden, or undetected.

<title level="2">Paragons of Promise</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #150: Broken Promises](/Sources.aspx?ID=15) pg. 75</row>

The citizens of Promise represent some of the most capable experts, greatest minds, and powerful warriors on Golarion—ideal teachers and trainers for PCs who want to maximize their own potential. If the PCs secure Visitor’s Pins or an alliance with Mengkare, their access to Promise’s trainers and records unlock all of the following uncommon class feats.

**Related Feats**: [Apex Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=1160), [Aura of Unbreakable Virtue](/Feats.aspx?ID=1161), [Bloodline Metamorphosis](/Feats.aspx?ID=1162), [Efficient Alchemy (Paragon)](/Feats.aspx?ID=1163), [Emblazon Divinity](/Feats.aspx?ID=1164), [Enduring Debilitation](/Feats.aspx?ID=1165), [Golden Body](/Feats.aspx?ID=1166), [Song of the Fallen](/Feats.aspx?ID=1168), [Spell Mastery](/Feats.aspx?ID=1843), [Ultimate Flexibility](/Feats.aspx?ID=1732), [Unstoppable Juggernaut](/Feats.aspx?ID=1631)
